settings.title: Frontend development
settings.text:
We're a Shopify theme specialist, and we can work on sites on other platforms like SquareSpace or Wix too.

Is your website dated? Are your buttons out of alignment? Is your text falling off the screen?

Does your online shop need a date picker widget, or does your contact form need extra fields specific to your business?

settings.title: Graphic design
settings.text: We create logos, branded social media and website banners, as well as print media as well. Does your business card need a refresh? How about a new sandwich board outside of your shop? We can design these to spec to send straight to your printer of choice, or we can help you find a good printer in your area - feel free to ask!

settings.title: E-commerce consulting
settings.text:
New to the wild world of e-commerce and building an online store? Or does your shop need a refresh? Feel free to contact us for a site audit, and we can give you our 2 cents!
We work with Shopify, SquareSpace, and Wix.
